location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 36 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus forwards a letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia concerning a buglow [buggalow] from Bombay that had been wrecked on the Persian coast and plundered by the inhabitants of Dashtee [Dashti], a few miles south of Bushire.The letter is accompanied by the following enclosure:a marginal note refers to a letter dated 10 June [1826] on page 179 of the volume [IOR/R/15/1/36, ff 89-91].
